title: Haiyoru! Nyaruani
synopsis: Animated Flash shorts based on the light novel series "Haiyore! Nyaruko-san." In these shorts, Nyarlko, an anthropomorphized female version of Nyarlathotep from the Cthulhu Mythos, is constantly being told off by Mahiro, a normal human boy, for all the crazy or stupid things she does.
staff: [['Tani, Azuma', ['Director']], ['Asumi, Kana', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Koin', ['Original Character Design']], ['Aisora, Manta', ['Screenplay', ' Original Creator']]]
